Posts.EditableText: This may be a stupid question, but on the main web site, how do you change your user image?
Posts.HTML: This may be a stupid question, but on the main web site, how do you change your user image?

Posts.EditableText: Log in to https://en.gravatar.com/ using the same email address you use for your account.
Posts.HTML: Log in to https://en.gravatar.com/ using the same email address you use for your account.
